column1: There once was an elephant named @entity0.She really liked to eat peanuts. She lived with a circus and performed with clowns.One day she was really hungry and could not find any peanuts. She asked the lion, "Do you have any peanuts?"The lion said, "Sorry, I do not like peanuts, but the squirrel may have some."@entity0 went looking for the squirrel and along the way saw a little girl.  The little girl was crying.@entity0 asked the little girl, "Why are you crying?"The little girl, @entity1, said, "I lost my parents!"The elephant put @entity1 on her back and said, "I can help you look for them."They looked high and low for @entity1's parents.@entity0 made a loud sound with her nose and @entity1's parents came to see what it was!Her parents were so happy to find @entity1 and so was @entity0.@entity0's stomach began to growl and @entity1 heard it.She dug into her parent's bag and brought out a bag of peanuts!@entity0 ate the peanuts and everyone lived happily ever after.
